data: Vivek Jain Vivek Jain Physics 311 518-442-4540 Associate Professor, University at Albany, SUNY (2018 - ) Assistant Professor, University at Albany, SUNY (2012-2017) University of Hawaii, 1988 MS Indian Institute of Technology, New Delhi, India, 1981 Experimental Particle Physics Member of the ATLAS experiment at the Large Hadron Collider at CERN, Switzerland Selected Publications: Some blog posts for the general public Trailer of "Particle Fever - a documentary about the quest for the Higgs boson " A measurement of material in the ATLAS tracker using secondary hadronic interactions in 7 TeV pp collisions " , JINST 11, 11020 (2016).
